Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm Jodi.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm Jodi.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a farmer around could really change things.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a er around could really change things.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... You sure you want to give away such a precious item? Well, thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... You sure you want to give away such a precious item? Well, thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: What a treat!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What a treat!

Entries.DialogueText: I think I'll make seafood tonight. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I'll make seafood tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: The view is breathtaking! Deep blue as far as the eye can see...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The view is breathtaking! Deep blue as far as the eye can see...

Entries.DialogueText: We all love it when Gus shows up.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We all love it when Gus shows up.

Entries.DialogueText: I heard about you and Sam. Hopefully he won't cause you any trouble! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard about you and Sam. Hopefully he won't cause you any trouble!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so happy for you and Sam. I think you two are the perfect match!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so happy for you and Sam. I think you two are the perfect match!

Entries.DialogueText: I never thought I'd say it... but I'll miss those awful noises from Sam's guitar... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I never thought I'd say it... but I'll miss those awful noises from Sam's guitar...

Entries.DialogueText: Are you alright? We've never seen anything like this before... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you alright? We've never seen anything like this before...

Entries.DialogueText: I wish my husband was here. He'd know exactly what to do. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish my hus was here. He'd know exactly what to do.

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent got up early to go play in the rain. I just hope they're right about it being completely harmless!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent got up early to go play in the rain. I just hope they're right about it being completely harmless!

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks again for bringing that fish! It was some of the best we've had in a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks again for bringing that fish! It was some of the best we've had in a while.

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* Did you hear about Shane? That's so terrible... I hope he's doing okay. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* Did you hear about Shane? That's so terrible... I hope he's doing okay.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... I heard what you did for Pam... Boy, I wonder what she did to get in your good graces like that? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... I heard what you did for Pam... Boy, I wonder what she did to get in your good graces like that?

Entries.DialogueText: ...I wish I had that kind of money to throw around... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I wish I had that kind of money to throw around...

Entries.DialogueText: Did you see Pam's new house? Boy... I wish I had that kind of money... I'd love to get the kitchen remodeled, at least... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you see Pam's new house? Boy... I wish I had that kind of money... I'd love to get the kitchen remodeled, at least...

Entries.DialogueText: Poor Clint... they say he's head-over-heels for Emily, but I've heard she only thinks of him as a friend...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Poor Clint... they say he's head-over-heels for Emily, but I've heard she only thinks of him as a friend...

Entries.DialogueText: I've been doing aerobics class with the ladies every week...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been doing aerobics class with the ladies every week...

Entries.DialogueText: Recently, someone new joined the class, but he made us all swear we wouldn't reveal his identity!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Recently, someone new joined the class, but he made us all swear we wouldn't reveal his identity!

Entries.DialogueText: Penny's a sweet girl. She's been Vincent's teacher for a while now, and he really loves her.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Penny's a sweet girl. She's been Vincent's teacher for a while now, and he really loves her.

Entries.DialogueText: They say the bus is back up and running. I'm sure Pam is happy about that...
Entries.DisplayPattern: They say the bus is back up and running. I'm sure Pam is happy about that...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard she'd been drinking more after losing her job... so hopefully this helps.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard she'd been drinking more after losing her job... so hopefully this helps.

Entries.DialogueText: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. Maybe you should show it to him?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. Maybe you should show it to him?

Entries.DialogueText: Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes?

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice to have a family... but I'd be lying if I said I never miss the freedom of being young... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice to have a family... but I'd be lying if I said I never miss the freedom of being young...

Entries.DialogueText: My husband Kent is a soldier, working overseas. That's why he's not here right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My hus Kent is a soldier, working overseas. That's why he's not here right now.

Entries.DialogueText: I know he'll come back safe once his tour is over!!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know he'll come back safe once his tour is over!!

Entries.DialogueText: Need something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Need something?

Entries.DialogueText: Exercise is important for staying healthy. I always make sure to set aside some time for it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Exercise is important for staying healthy. I always make sure to set aside some for it.

Entries.DialogueText: As a parent, I don't have much time to devote to myself. So I try and make every minute count.
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a parent, I don't have much to devote to myself. So I try and make every minute count.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I could spend more time outside, but there's so much work to do.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I could spend more outside, but there's so much work to do.

Entries.DialogueText: I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my hands soft.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my hands soft.

Entries.DialogueText: The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy.

Entries.DialogueText: Ok, bye!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ok, bye!

Entries.DialogueText: What did you say? It's %time already? My goodness!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What did you say? It's already? My goodness!

Entries.DialogueText: I still have tons of work to do! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I still have tons of work to do!

Entries.DialogueText: Where does all the time go? *sigh*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Where does all the go? *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. He was such a cute little kid. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. He was such a cute little kid.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell him I said that. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell him I said that.

Entries.DialogueText: You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You must really like talking to me, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: So you're a farmer, huh? Interesting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So you're a er, huh? Interesting.

Entries.DialogueText: I've never met a farmer before.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never met a er before.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe some day you can teach me how to grow vegetables. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe some day you can teach me how to grow vegetables.

Entries.DialogueText: The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!
Entries.DisplayPattern: The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!

Entries.DialogueText: The food at Pierre's is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The food at Pierre's is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi.

Entries.DialogueText: Need something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Need something?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old .

Entries.DialogueText: Once you've got everything in order, it's going to add a lot to our community! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Once you've got everything in order, it's going to add a lot to our community!

Entries.DialogueText: It's going to be a lot of work for you, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's going to be a lot of work for you, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my husband's safe return.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my hus's safe return.

Entries.DialogueText: Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my husband's safe return.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my hus's safe return.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard somes.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm taking a break from house chores today. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm taking a break from house chores today.

Entries.DialogueText: $e
Entries.DisplayPattern: $e

Entries.DialogueText: I'm taking the day off. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm taking the day off.

Entries.DialogueText: If I don't spend any time outside, I'll go crazy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I don't spend any outside, I'll go crazy!

Entries.DialogueText: Plus I don't want my legs to turn soft.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Plus I don't want my legs to turn soft.

Entries.DialogueText: I had a dream that I had complete freedom, no obligation to anyone but myself...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a dream that I had complete freedom, no obligation to anyone but myself...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Then I woke up and realized I had a full day of house chores ahead of me... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Then I woke up and realized I had a full day of house chores ahead of me...

Entries.DialogueText: But I don't regret having a family, {Farmer_Name}... Sam and Vincent mean everything to me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I don't regret having a family, ... Sam and Vincent mean everything to me!

Entries.DialogueText: Summer is nice, but it also means more work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Summer is nice, but it also means more work.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll have to keep the garden in shape on top of working in the house!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll have to keep the garden in shape on top of working in the house!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need something? I'm a little busy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need something? I'm a little busy.

Entries.DialogueText: How's my little Sammy doing on the old farm? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's my little Sammy doing on the old ?

Entries.DialogueText: Housework is frustrating because you're never finished.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Housework is frustrating because you're never finished.

Entries.DialogueText: The day after I sweep the floor, it's dirty again.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The day after I sweep the floor, it's dirty again.

Entries.DialogueText: What in the world am I going to make for dinner?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What in the world am I going to make for dinner?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I've spoiled the boys a bit. They've never had to do any chores.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I've spoiled the boys a bit. They've never had to do any chores.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a man now, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a man now, though.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope he hasn't grown up to be lazy. That won't do. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope he hasn't grown up to be lazy. That won't do.

Entries.DialogueText: Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Being a parent isn't very easy.

Entries.DialogueText: Is Sam just bumming around the farm, or is he contributing?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is Sam just bumming around the , or is he contributing?

Entries.DialogueText: Caroline and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Caroline and I are good friends. I tell her everything.

Entries.DialogueText: When you become a parent, you have to leave your old lifestyle behind.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you become a parent, you have to leave your old lifestyle behind.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe that's not entirely true... but if you're not careful, it will happen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe that's not entirely true... but if you're not careful, it will happen.

Entries.DialogueText: I loved playing in the snow when I was a kid. The great thing about being a mother is that I get to enjoy it again. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I loved playing in the snow when I was a kid. The great thing about being a mother is that I get to enjoy it again.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. Do you get tired of people asking about your farm all the time?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. Do you get tired of people asking about your all the ?

Entries.DialogueText: I think I would.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I would.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Sometimes I dream about life on my own... without a family to look after. Is that horrible? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Somes I dream about life on my own... without a family to look after. Is that horrible?

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell anyone. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: What do I do for fun? Hmm... That's a good question.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do I do for fun? Hmm... That's a good question.

Entries.DialogueText: I like sleeping. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like sleeping.

Entries.DialogueText: Kent has been home for a while now, but he still seems uneasy. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kent has been home for a while now, but he still seems uneasy.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of his. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of his. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.

Entries.DialogueText: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since he moved out...
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since he moved out...

Entries.DialogueText: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with Kent being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with Kent being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe I'm saying this to you. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe I'm saying this to you.

Entries.DialogueText: It would be nice to take a vacation once in a while... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It would be nice to take a vacation once in a while...

Entries.DialogueText: If I was rich the first thing I'd do would be to hire a maid and a chef.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I was rich the first thing I'd do would be to hire a maid and a chef.

Entries.DialogueText: My goodness, that would be nice! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My goodness, that would be nice!

Entries.DialogueText: I should count my blessings more often. We have a good life here. Some people don't have enough food to eat. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I should count my blessings more often. We have a good life here. Some people don't have enough food to eat.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you wipe your boots off before coming in? Sorry... I just cleaned the floor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you wipe your boots off before coming in? Sorry... I just cleaned the floor.

Entries.DialogueText: But you're always welcome in here! Heh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But you're always welcome in here! Heh.

Entries.DialogueText: *puff* ...hi {Farmer_Name}! *pant* Whew... that was quite a workout, walking all the way up here. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *puff* ...hi ! *pant* Whew... that was quite a workout, walking all the way up here.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... I came by to ask if you wanted to have dinner with us tonight!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... I came by to ask if you wanted to have dinner with us tonight!

Entries.DialogueText: You don't have to... but if you decide to come, could you please bring a largemouth bass with you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You don't have to... but if you decide to come, could you please bring a largemouth bass with you?

Entries.DialogueText: ...that's right. One of those big, slimy fish from the lake. I need one for the casserole I'm making. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...that's right. One of those big, slimy fish from the lake. I need one for the casserole I'm making.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, well... it'll be at our house at around 7:00 PM tonight... don't forget the largemouth bass! Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, well... it'll be at our house at around 7:00 PM tonight... don't forget the largemouth bass! Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: Fish casserole always hits the spot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fish casserole always hits the spot.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam? I'm coming in!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam? I'm coming in!

Entries.DialogueText: What's wrong, Honey? Were you doing something... bad?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's wrong, Honey? Were you doing something... bad?

Entries.DialogueText: I thought I heard some weird sounds coming from your room...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I thought I heard some weird sounds coming from your room...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! *giggle*... That explains why you're all red and sweaty. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! *giggle*... That explains why you're all red and sweaty.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, well good luck. I'll see you in the morning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, well good luck. I'll see you in the morning.

Entries.DialogueText: Boycott!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Boycott!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no...

Entries.DialogueText: Yum!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yum!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, I'm so glad you came, {Farmer_Name}! And you brought the fish! Wonderful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, I'm so glad you came, ! And you brought the fish! Wonderful.

Entries.DialogueText: Sam! Could you come in here and help clean this fish?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam! Could you come in here and help clean this fish?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, it looks wonderful... and it smells so fresh! Thanks so much for doing this, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, it looks wonderful... and it smells so fresh! Thanks so much for doing this, .

Entries.DialogueText: Kent caught a fish, too, but he eats about a whole fish to himself! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kent caught a fish, too, but he eats about a whole fish to himself!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh hi, {Farmer_Name}! Come in! Do I smell fresh fish?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh hi, ! Come in! Do I smell fresh fish?

Entries.DialogueText: Sam! Could you come in here and help with dinner?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam! Could you come in here and help with dinner?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, this looks like quality bass, {Farmer_Name}. Thanks so much for bringing this. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, this looks like quality bass, . Thanks so much for bringing this.

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was out of this world...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was out of this world...

Entries.DialogueText: I almost feel like part of the family, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I almost feel like part of the family, now.

Entries.DialogueText: What was that sound?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What was that sound?

Entries.DialogueText: *gasp* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: This is absolutely terrible! What happened? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is absolutely terrible! What happened?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for telling me the truth, {Farmer_Name}. It's not such a big deal.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for telling me the truth, . It's not such a big deal.

Entries.DialogueText: You did WHAT, Sam?! What's gotten into you?! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You did WHAT, Sam?! What's gotten into you?!

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, honey. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, honey.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm angry at you. I have no idea why you lied like that. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm angry at you. I have no idea why you lied like that.

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry about what happened earlier.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry about what happened earlier.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}! I'm just making some popcorn. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, ! I'm just making some popcorn.

Entries.DialogueText: But, dear... popcorn was always your favorite before you left. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, dear... popcorn was always your before you left.

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* {Farmer_Name}... can you say something to him? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* ... can you say something to him?

Entries.DialogueText: It's okay, dear. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's okay, dear.

Entries.DialogueText: The last thing I want to do is make you upset. I'll do my best to keep your spirits up from now on.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The last thing I want to do is make you upset. I'll do my best to keep your spirits up from now on.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you're a friend of the family, {Farmer_Name}. Sorry about my behavior before.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you're a friend of the family, . Sorry about my behavior before.

Entries.DialogueText: I overheard the price... that's outrageous! You should be ashamed. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I overheard the price... that's outrageous! You should be ashamed.

Entries.DialogueText: No way!
Entries.DisplayPattern: No way!

Entries.DialogueText: Your veggies look great, {Farmer_Name}. It's Pierre's price that turned us away.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your veggies look great, . It's Pierre's price that turned us away.

Entries.DialogueText: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor Lewis had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor Lewis had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no. Who's responsible for littering here? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no. Who's responsible for littering here?

Entries.DialogueText: Every year we get some tourists that don't respect our town... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Every year we get some tourists that don't respect our town...

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent's upset that I won't let him go into the haunted maze... but he's just a little boy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent's upset that I won't let him go into the haunted maze... but he's just a little boy!

Entries.DialogueText: Sam took Vincent into the maze. I hope they're okay... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sam took Vincent into the maze. I hope they're okay...

Entries.DialogueText: Vincent loves this festival... it's a joy to see him so happy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vincent loves this festival... it's a joy to see him so happy.

Entries.DialogueText: Kent always seems a little antsy during big gatherings like this...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Kent always seems a little antsy during big gatherings like this...

Entries.DialogueText: Are you going to be dancing today, {Farmer_Name}? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you going to be dancing today, ?

Entries.DialogueText: I have special earrings I only wear once a year for this event. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have special earrings I only wear once a year for this event.

Entries.DialogueText: They're little daffodils... see? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They're little daffodils... see?

Entries.DialogueText: I hope the soup is good this year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope the soup is good this year.

Entries.DialogueText: I've heard the summer season gets very busy for farmers. Make sure you don't overwork yourself! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've heard the summer gets very busy for ers. Make sure you don't overwork yourself!

Entries.DialogueText: There! I just saw something glowing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: There! I just saw something glowing!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... It's gone. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... It's gone.

Entries.DialogueText: The full moon will guide the jellies to our shore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The full moon will guide the jellies to our shore.

Entries.DialogueText: It's not a good time of year for a diet... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's not a good of year for a diet...

Entries.DialogueText: This spot is for the overflow presents. There's just too many to count this year! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This spot is for the overflow presents. There's just too many to count this year!

Entries.DialogueText: The forest looks beautiful in the winter, doesn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The forest looks beautiful in the winter, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Gatherings like this are a good way to build community with our neighbors.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gatherings like this are a good way to build community with our neighbors.

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice how cold weather seems to bring people together.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice how cold weather seems to bring people together.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you're such a sweetheart! I really love this!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you're such a sweetheart! I really love this!

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you! This makes my day really special.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you! This makes my day really special.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, well I guess I could always put this in the compost...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, well I guess I could always put this in the compost...

Entries.DialogueText: *Blech*... I hate this...
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Blech*... I hate this...

Entries.DialogueText: That's so nice of you! Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's so nice of you! Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...

Entries.DialogueText: It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...

Entries.DialogueText: It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.

Entries.DialogueText: I saw this movie once, a long time ago. It's very romantic!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I saw this movie once, a long ago. It's very romantic!

Entries.DialogueText: That was lovely... The theme of the movie really resonated with me. Thanks for bringing me!
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was lovely... The theme of the movie really resonated with me. Thanks for bringing me!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope the seats are plush, I've been on my feet all day!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope the seats are plush, I've been on my feet all day!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not much of a movie buff... but I had a good time! Thanks, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not much of a movie buff... but I had a good ! Thanks, .

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, don't mind me, I'm just doing a little shopping.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, don't mind me, I'm just doing a little shopping.

Entries.DialogueText: If I don't browse the shops, I might miss the perfect decoration for our living room!
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I don't browse the shops, I might miss the perfect decoration for our living room!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry, my selection isn't very good this year...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry, my selection isn't very good this year...
